com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common

Class Centers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common.Centers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector>

    public final class Centers
extends Object
implements Iterable<org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector>
    Represents a collection of Vector instances that act as the centers of a set of clusters, as in a k-means model.

    • Constructor Summary
